thread.section_title: Uncle Dan's Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Uncle Dan's | udans.com | 3 of 32
thread.title: Mckell

author: Mckell
title: Mckell
text:
Updated review* After posting my original review, less than 24 hours later I was contacted by Uncle Dans, was refunded the shipping costs and was given an apology for the confusion with ordering from their website and was told that they would update the description and make it clearer to avoid confusion with future customers. Very satisfied with end result and appreciate that they reached out to me so quickly and resolved my frustrations.
ORIGINAL REVIEW: *Wrong item was sent and was expected to pay for return shipping and was not refunded for shipping costs either. So I paid $15.00 extra to recive and return the wrong item. Also tried to call them several times and was everytime put through to a voicemail.*
